entry.title: [BIP Proposal] Version bits with timeout and delay.
entry.summary: In September 2015, a discussion was held on the bitcoin-dev mailing list regarding the enforcement of rules when 75% consensus is reached. The advantage of enforcing this rule only for blocks with the bit set is that miners would receive early notifications if they have implemented the rule incorrectly. This would prevent them from producing blocks that they believe are fine but actually aren't. However, the author of the email remains unconvinced.
